title: Ex-Playboy model can now discuss alleged Trump affair
text:
Ex-Playboy model can now discuss alleged Trump affair 6:15am EDT - 01:17 
Former Playboy model Karen McDougal reached an agreement on Wednesday with tabloid publisher American Media Inc that will allow her to speak freely about an affair she alleges she had with President Donald Trump, the company said in a statement. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former Playboy model Karen McDougal reached an agreement on Wednesday with tabloid publisher American Media Inc that will allow her to speak freely about an affair she alleges she had with President Donald Trump, the company said in a statement.
